summary: Iteration 19 testing complete. All 7 features verified: (1) Audio Player generates TTS on-demand with loading state, (2) Search Page with trending tags (#GENERAL, #TECH, #POLITICS), category filter, and search results, (3) Saved Page with empty state, filter and sort dropdowns, (4) Briefing Page redesigned with ARCHIVE_LOG sidebar, voice selector, GENERATE_BRIEFING button, (5) Discover Page footer with newsletter input REMOVED, (6) News Detail share uses window.location.origin URL, (7) Backend APIs all working - /api/search, /api/trending, /api/briefing/history
critical_code_review_comments: Feature 1: AudioContext.js correctly implements TTS generation on-demand (lines 45-114) with isLoading state
Feature 2: SearchPage.js has search-input, search-btn, category-filter data-testids, trending tags display correctly
Feature 3: SavedPage.js has filter-select, sort-select dropdowns with empty state showing NO_SAVED_STORIES
Feature 4: MorningBriefingPage.js redesigned with ARCHIVE_LOG sidebar, voice-selector dropdown, generate-btn
Feature 5: DiscoverPage.js footer section with newsletter input is REMOVED (verified - no email input found)
Feature 6: NewsDetailPage.js line 85 and 171 correctly use window.location.origin for share URL and og:url
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 19 features verified: (1) Audio player TTS on-demand working with loading state, (2) Search page with trending tags and category filter, (3) Saved page with filter/sort dropdowns and empty state, (4) Briefing page redesigned with ARCHIVE_LOG sidebar and voice selector, (5) Discover page footer REMOVED, (6) News detail share URL uses window.location.origin, (7) All backend APIs working.
